item.name: Fetch all tasks or a paginated list of tasks

query.description: Page number for pagination (1-indexed). If omitted, all tasks are returned.
Number of tasks per page. Defaults to 10 if not provided when page is specified.

response.name: List of all tasks for the authenticated user, or a paginated response if page parameter is provided
